senses.definition: #轉介 (to refer; to send; to direct)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 呢單case我哋部門會refer畀你哋跟。
examples.jyutping: nei1 daan1 keis1 ngo5 dei6 bou6 mun4 wui5 wi6 foe1 bei2 nei5 dei6 gan1.
examples.translation: Our department will forward this case to your team for follow-up.

senses.definition: #參考 (to refer to; to inform or guide someone to look at another source or record for more information)

examples.jyutping: haa2? jau6 tin4? nei5 wi6 foe1 faan1 ngo5 fan6 si1 wi1 laa1.
examples.translation: What? I need to fill it in again? Just refer to my CV, please.

senses.definition: #重讀 某個科目、課程 (to retake (a subject in university or college))
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 佢上個#sem#肥 咗科數學所以而家要retake。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 soeng6 go3 sem6 fei4 zo2 fo1 sou3 hok6 so2 ji5 ji4 gaa1 jiu3 ri6 tik1.
examples.translation: He failed a math course, so he has to retake it now.

senses.definition: 表演#rap 嘅人（量詞：個／名） (rapper; rap artist)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hoeng1 gong2 !rep1 paa4 naam4 neoi5 bei2 lai6 jyun4 syu4.
examples.translation: There is a large disparity in the gender ratio of Hong Kong's rappers.

senses.definition: 親人、情人以外，同房或者同一個單位一齊住嘅人（量詞：個） (room mate; person living in the same apartment or room)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 自願噉#重讀 某個年級，唔係自願嘅會叫#留班 (to repeat a year in school by one's own decision)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 ning4 jyun2 ri6 pit1 zung1 luk6 dou1 m4 soeng2 duk6 aa6 sou1.
examples.translation: She would rather repeat her sixth year of secondary school than apply for an associate degree course.

examples.jyutping: ngo5 jan1 soeng2 nei5, wi6 sbek1
